p: Several studies have addressed the pathogenic factors in Candida species to facilitate the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of candidiasis [ 8 - 11 ]. Herbal agents with antifungal activity represent an ideal alternative for chemical medicines regarding the limitations of synthetic antifungal drugs with a high production cost and numerous side effects [ 8 ]. Accordingly, the antibacterial and antifungal effects of many plant species have been widely investigated during the recent two decades [ 12 - 17 ].
